sn1.17:1: "Dukkaraṁ duttitikkhañca,abyattena ca sāmaññaṁ;Bahūhi tattha sambādhā,yattha bālo visīdatī"ti.
sn1.17:2: "Katihaṁ careyya sāmaññaṁ,cittañce na nivāraye;Pade pade visīdeyya,saṅkappānaṁ vasānugoti.
sn1.17:3: Kummova aṅgāni sake kapāle,Samodahaṁ bhikkhu manovitakke;Anissito aññamaheṭhayāno,Parinibbuto nūpavadeyya kañcī"ti.
